CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Special_Billing_Scenario__c,"Delayed Subscription"), DATE( YEAR( Startdate_contract__c ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( Startdate_contract__c ) + of_Month_Delayed_Rent_Free__c - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( Startdate_contract__c ) + of_Month_Delayed_Rent_Free__c - 1 + IF( DAY ( Startdate_contract__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( Startdate_contract__c ) + of_Month_Delayed_Rent_Free__c - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY( Startdate_contract__c ) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( Startdate_contract__c ) + of_Month_Delayed_Rent_Free__c - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( Startdate_contract__c ) ) ), Startdate_contract__c)
CustomField.label: Subscription Start Date
